How can I verify a file using a checksum with the CLI?

You can verify a file using a checksum with the CLI by running the following command:
```
./verus verifyhash "Verus Coin Foundation Releases@" <signature> <checksum>
```
Replace `<signature>` with the signature from the text file and `<checksum>` with the checksum of the file you want to verify.

## Verifying Downloads A txt file containing the signer, standard sha256 file checksum, and signature, is included for each download.
